pages.text: The Ravenous Maw or simply the maw is a mysterious beast with an unknown origin. It has the ability to mutate, acquiring different skills as it evolves. The creature becomes stronger as it consumes specific monstersâ€”more details can be found in the Stages section.

The Ravenous Maw will not function if its durability is too low. To help it regenerate, you can feed it a Feast. To do this, put the Ravenous Maw in a crafting apparatus with one of the Feasts it accepts. Each Feast restores a different amount of durability. Don't forget to feed the beast.

Each Stage of the Ravenous Maw can acquire specific Mutations, with the number of Mutations increasing at each higher Stage. Some Mutations can be configured in the menu opened by "Shift + Right Click".
